A special mission associated with the Sword of Solkan has been issued.

A unique business opportunity will soon present itself, allowing us to pay off any outstanding debts racked up by House Den Euwe. We can absorb their entire Eastern Venture by doing so. We need to build up some reserves for this, however.
Send a convoy to Port Reaver and Crispijn van Haagen shall join your convoy as a Legendary Hero
The Marienburg State-Army shall march to your doorstep
The Directorate shall look the other way when you traverse through the Shadows
